page.title: 13SHOPS IN COWES
page.content: West Cowes has a winding and picturesque High Street crammed with shops, notable amongst them are{ {Ruths}, a bustling cake shop, sweet shop and restaurant, whose owner aims,in common with most shop owners,'to help and improve Cowes for everyone living in it both socially and economically'. Then there is {Benzies},a high class jewellers which specialises in yachting jewellery and makes on the premises 9 carat gold bargee brooches and tie pins.{Morgans is an outfitters which is credited with designing the familiar yachting outfit of cap, reefer jacket, trousers and navy and white deck shoes. {Pascall Atkey}, has been providing for the needs of sailors since 1799 and still makes charcoal burning cabin heaters on the premises for sale world wide.
